name: Dr. Tejal Lathia, MD
description: Dr. Tejal is an Endocrinologist (a doctor dealing with all things hormonal). She has a keen interest in Polycystic ovarian disease (PCOS), thyroid imbalance and menopause. She believes in holistic treatment of patients combining allopathic medicine with lifestyle modifications.
